short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically replay YouTube videos when they finish.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension has a functionality to automatically replay YouTube videos when they finish without human intervention. So, when the video finish it's always automatically restart and you continue watching and listen your favorite videos on YouTube. Does it amazing, doesn't?
